interests.CanAdd: Inā hikiʻole iāʻoe keʻimi i kāu mea eʻimi nei, hiki iāʻoe ke hoʻonui i kahi makemake hou ma lalo nei:
interests.TrySynonyms: ʻAʻoleʻoe eʻike? E ho'āʻo i kekahi mau'ōlelo like.
interests.AddUnderCategory: Hoʻohui ma lalo o ka papa ...

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Ua kauʻia ka leka no ka loiloi mana. Hoʻopili hou i kahi hoʻokuʻu.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Makemakeʻoe e pani i kēia kūkākūkāʻana?

dialog.chooseFromContacts: E koho i kāu mau leka
dialog.chooseAgainFromContacts: E koho hou i nā Hoala
dialog.inviteSelectedContacts: E koho i nā Hoala i koho
dialog.photoInstruction: Inā hiki ke kanaka i kānana i kāu QR code i mua o kāu, e kiʻi i kiʻi

dialog.QRtitle: E nānā i kēia QR code

html.posted: Ua hoʻohanaʻo {{call 'avatar.displayName'}} i ka leka {{message.fields.type}} i {{stream.fields.title}}

mobile.alert: Hoʻounaʻia nā kono mai kā mākou helu, nā mea iʻikeʻoleʻia e kou mau hoaaloha. E hahai i kahi wikiwiki e hoʻomaopopo iā lākou ua hoʻouna mai ka kono mai iāʻoe, e noi ana iā lākou e kaomi i ka loulou.
mobile.confirm: Hoʻounaʻia nā kono mai kā mākou helu, nā mea iʻikeʻoleʻia e kou mau hoaaloha. Makemakeʻoe e hoʻomau i kahi wikiwiki e hoʻomaopopo iā lākou ua hele mai ka kono mai iāʻoe, e noi ana iā lākou e kaomi i ka loulou.
mobile.check: ʻAe, ua hoʻouna wale aku wau iāʻoe i kahi'āpana i ka {{app}} taupānga. Eʻoluʻolu e nānā i kāu sms a kaomi i ka loulou!

email.alert: Kāheaʻia nā leka mai ko mākou kaiaulu, nā mea iʻikeʻoleʻia e kou mau hoaaloha. E hahai i kahi wikiwiki e hoʻomaopopo iā lākou ua hoʻouna mai ka kono mai iāʻoe, e noi ana iā lākou e kaomi i ka loulou.
email.confirm: Kāheaʻia nā leka mai ko mākou kaiaulu, nā mea iʻikeʻoleʻia e kou mau hoaaloha. Makemakeʻoe e hoʻomau i kahi wikiwiki e hoʻomaopopo iā lākou ua hele mai ka kono mai iāʻoe, e noi ana iā lākou e kaomi i ka loulou.
email.subject: Loaʻa iāʻoe kahi kono?
email.body: ʻAe, ua hoʻouna wale aku wau iāʻoe i kahi'āpana i ka {{app}} taupānga. Eʻoluʻolu e paʻi i kāu leka uila a kāomi i ka loulou i laila!

allow.cameraAndMicrophoneTitle: E ho'āla i ka kamera a me ke kani
